title: Goodyear Microfiber Drying Towel Xl Deep Pile For Extra Absorbency| Microfiber Technology| Cleaning Fiber Attracts Dust |satin Safety Edging Protects Against Scratching| Extra Absorbency Free Finish
availability_text: Only 10 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Extra Large Size for Superior Coverage: Experience efficient drying with the Goodyear Microfiber Drying Towel XL. Measuring an impressive size, this towel ensures full coverage for larger surfaces, making it ideal for washing and drying cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Microfiber Technology for Superior Cleaning: Equipped with advanced microfiber technology, the Goodyear towel effortlessly lifts and traps dust, dirt, and grime, ensuring a spotless clean with every swipe. The high-density cleaning fibers are designed to attract and hold debris without scratching, making it ideal for use on delicate surfaces, including paint, glass, and chrome.

Deep Pile for Maximum Absorbency: Goodyear Microfibre Drying Towel Xl Engineered with a deep pile construction, this microfiber towel offers exceptional absorbency. The plush fibers trap and hold more water, allowing you to dry your vehicle more thoroughly and efficiently.

Satin Safety Edging for Scratch Protection: The Goodyear Pro Valet Towel features a satin safety edging that protects against scratches and swirls, ensuring your vehicle’s finish remains flawless. The soft, smooth edging glides gently across surfaces, providing peace of mind during every cleaning session.

Highly Absorbent for a Streak-Free Finish: With its deep pile construction, this towel offers superior absorbency, quickly soaking up water and leaving your vehicle with a streak-free, swirl-free finish. The Goodyear Pro Valet Towel is engineered to hold a large amount of water, making it perfect for drying even the largest vehicles with ease.
description: Introducing the Goodyear Microfiber Drying Towel XL, designed for superior performance and convenience in car care. The high-density microfiber technology is engineered to lift and trap water, ensuring a streak-free finish every time. The towel’s microfiber fibers are specifically designed to attract and hold onto dust and debris, making it an ideal choice for maintaining a pristine surface. This innovative cleaning fiber ensures that your vehicle’s paint remains flawless, without the need for additional cleaning agents. The towel’s extra absorbent capabilities make it perfect for quickly handling large volumes of water, reducing drying time and effort. To ensure safety during use, the Goodyear Microfiber Drying Towel XL is equipped with satin safety edging. This thoughtful design feature protects your vehicle’s delicate surfaces from scratches and abrasions, offering peace of mind as you perform your car care routine. The satin edging not only prevents damage but also enhances the overall durability of the towel. With its extra-large size, this drying towel provides ample coverage for large vehicles, making it a versatile addition to your car care arsenal. Designed with user convenience in mind, the towel is easy to clean and maintain. Simply machine wash and tumble dry, and it’s ready for your next use. The microfiber technology remains effective wash after wash, retaining its absorbency and performance over time.

specifications_table.Care instructions: ‎Machine wash in cold or warm water with mild detergent. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not bleach. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.
